item.title: LU
item.description: score:138 Chances: Lufax Holding Ltd is a leading financial services enabler for small business owners in China The company’s technology-empowered personal financial services platform offers personal lending and wealth management solutions Lufax Holding’s significant public companies ownership suggests that the key decisions are influenced by major stakeholders Risks: Lufax Holding received a notice from the New York Stock Exchange indicating that it is below the NYSE’s continued listing standards The company’s ADS trading price is a concern for the NYSE’s listing standards Score:138 chances characters count - risks characters count = 138
